titles.title: A resolution designating 2009 as the "Year of the Noncommissioned Officer Corps of the United States Army".
A resolution designating 2009 as the "Year of the Noncommissioned Officer Corps of the United States Army".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates 2009 as the "Year of the Noncommissioned Officer Corps of the United States Army."
